attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current law on fuel tax is unfair. There is a double tax on fuel!!

We are paying around 50p in fuel duty and there is a VAT on top making the total tax is 58.75p!!

The current rate of VAT is 17.5% - when the oil companies increase the fuel prices we automatically pay more in tax by VAT.

Gordon Brown is going to put 2p extra on fuel duty - he already got more than 2p by VAT!!

I think it is time to abolish the VAT and make the tax into a single tax!!

Do not forget that we also have to pay the tax for the fuel tanker's fuel which is already being double taxed.
